type  axis_xy,
type  xy_min,
type  xy_max,
type  DEBUG

Parameters:
imageImage to be cropped
axis_xyoriginal range of axes in the image
xy_mintop left hand corner of the crop box
xy_maxbottom right hand corner of the crop box
